info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 7:04PM EDT until July 29 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Person County in central North Carolina... Vance County in central North Carolina... Granville County in central North Carolina... North central Durham County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Franklin County in central North Carolina... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 702 PM EDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms were located from near Virgilina to 7 miles east of Rougemont, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Henderson, Oxford, Butner, Kittrell, Stem, Stovall, Middleburg, Lake Michie, Gillburg and Steele Creek Marina & Campground. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
